meanings.definition: The quality of being pompous or self-important.
meanings.sent1: Her constant pomposities made it hard for others to approach her.
meanings.sent2: His speech was full of pomposities, making it difficult to take him seriously.
meanings.sent3: During the talent show, his pomposities about his singing ability made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The king's pomposities were like a heavy cloak, weighing down his subjects.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's pomposities were so exaggerated that they became the talk of the school.

meanings.definition: An instance of being pompous or self-important.
meanings.sent1: One of the most memorable pomposities was when he claimed to be the best at everything.
meanings.sent2: The politician's pomposities during the debate turned off many voters.
meanings.sent3: His pomposities at the party were so over the top that even his friends were embarrassed.
meanings.sent4: The pomposities of the celebrity were like a shield, protecting her from criticism.
meanings.sent5: The pomposities of the CEO were so extreme that they alienated the entire staff.
